meanings.definition: Written or printed between lines of text.
meanings.sent1: The interlinear notes helped me understand the difficult passage.
meanings.sent2: The interlinear translation made it easier to comprehend the ancient text.
meanings.sent3: The interlinear comments added a touch of humor to the serious document.
meanings.sent4: The interlinear explanations acted as a bridge between the complex ideas.
meanings.sent5: The interlinear markings stood out clearly against the background.

meanings.sent1: The interlinear design of the pattern created a unique look.
meanings.sent2: The interlinear spacing made the text more visually appealing.
meanings.sent3: The interlinear stripes on the shirt gave it a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: The interlinear shadows added depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The interlinear elements subtly enhanced the overall composition.
